explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a bright yellow short-sleeved shirt and blue pants is standing in front of a wooden door, facing away from the camera, his right hand holding the doorknob. On the ground are checkered tiles, with white walls and raised decorations next to him.

[0-2] Next, the man opens the door. Inside the room are three little girls. The girl on the right is wearing a white top and black pants. The girl in the middle is wearing a blue top and blue pants, carrying a brown bag, and wearing a pink headscarf. The girl on the left is wearing a purple top and black pants, carrying a brown bag. A white wall and a window can be seen behind them.
